t: Amazon.com: Southpole Men's Active Fleece & Tech Woven Cargo Jogger Pants : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry
s: This is my second order from Southpole. I ordered the pair I am wearing now a year ago. Being 6 foot 3 inches and 250 pounds, I need special pants. I have tried lots of other brands, none fit well. These are fantastic - I think I may order more just in case the company ceases to exist.
